lines: Even an experienced connoisseur can be misled by an elaborate label and elegant packaging. I, on the other hand, have no choice but to focus on the taste and texture of the wine itself.
How ironic it is that what I once considered to be my greatest weakness has become my greatest asset.
To think that Drest would chance upon the key to reviving the Bacchus vineyards!
I owe you many thanks as well, my friend, for you are the one who has set these events in motion.
<sniff> <sniff> The scent of the Navel clings to you still.
...Did you truly think me that perceptive? No, no─I learned of your victory from Captain Wheiskaet. I raised a glass in your honor that very eve.
<sniff> <sniff> I see you managed to find the perfumed lady. And...a goobbue? Oh dear.
She is well? Thank the Twelve! For a moment, I was concerned you had arrived too late.
I heard a most interesting rumor the other day. Apparently, Castrum Occidens was built primarily as a research facility, as the Garleans had taken an interest in certain subterranean caverns.
Moreover, a certain adventurer was said to have infiltrated the castrum and located the entrance to the caverns in question! Fascinating, wouldn't you agree?
...Of course I know it was you. My ears are almost as sharp as my nose, in case you were unaware.

obj.n: What Do You Mean You Forgot the Wine
It Was a Very Good Year
